title: The speed of loading data is very slow when use python 3.6
body_html: When I try to run dcgan from pytorch/examples, I selected the cifar 10 dataset. It took very long time to load cifar 10 into gpu memory while cifar 10 is relatively small dataset compared with dataset like imagenet or lsun. After switch to python 3.5, the data loading process finishes quickly.
body_text: When I try to run dcgan from pytorch/examples, I selected the cifar 10 dataset. It took very long time to load cifar 10 into gpu memory while cifar 10 is relatively small dataset compared with dataset like imagenet or lsun. After switch to python 3.5, the data loading process finishes quickly.
body: When I try to run dcgan from pytorch/examples, I selected the cifar 10 dataset. It took very long time to load cifar 10 into gpu memory while cifar 10 is relatively small dataset compared with dataset like imagenet or lsun. After switch to python 3.5, the data loading process finishes quickly.
